definition: head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: Mortuary later picked up 40 people survived Gai, also a Canadian and bandit buried in tombs edge.
sentences.chinese: 後人殮拾40人遺賅時，亦一併將強盜屍首葬於墓邊。

sentences.english: Person's dead bodies that ambuscade us are entire secondhand along them to turn corpse powder to turn work to.
sentences.chinese: 伏擊我們的人屍首都被他們用化屍粉化去了。

sentences.english: John's disciples came and took his body and buried it.
sentences.chinese: 約翰的門徒來，把屍首領去，埋葬了。

sentences.english: We found corpulent corpse and a letter of correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 發現裏面有一具癡肥的屍首和一封聯繫信件。

sentences.english: 45When he learned from the centurion that it was so, he gave the body to Joseph.
sentences.chinese: 既從百夫長得知實情，就把耶穌的屍首賜給約瑟。

sentences.english: But as for you, your carcases, they shall fall in this wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 至於你們，你們的屍首必倒在這曠野。

sentences.english: His corse may boast its urn and narrow cave.
sentences.chinese: 讓他的屍首去誇耀它的陋穴和骨灰甕。

sentences.english: He dived into the water to look for the dead body.
His corpse may boast its urn and narrow cave.
sentences.chinese: 讓他們的屍首去炫耀墳穴和骨灰甕。

sentences.english: Enchantment-free, Gringotts collapsed into a mass grave for goblin bodies.
sentences.chinese: 沒有了魔法，古靈閣坍塌成妖精屍首的巨大墳墓。

sentences.english: But as for you， your carcases， they shall fall in this wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 至於你們，你們的屍首必倒在這曠野。

sentences.english: And when he knew it of the centurion, he gave the body to Joseph.
sentences.chinese: 既從百夫長得知實情，就把耶穌的屍首賜給約瑟。

sentences.english: We found a corpulent corpse and a letter of correspondence .
sentences.chinese: 發現裏面有一具癡肥的屍首和一封聯繫信件。

sentences.english: And they raised a large pile of rocks over it, which remains to this day.
sentences.chinese: 在屍首上堆成一大堆石頭，直存到今日。

sentences.english: It will be better for me to throw myself into the lake so they cannot find my corpse.
sentences.chinese: 我還是投水自盡的好，這樣他們也無法得到我的屍首。

sentences.english: Matsui arrived as interfaces to see sons body and grief.
sentences.chinese: 松井堪介趕到，看到兒子的屍首，悲痛萬分。

definition: to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
lit. shocks the eye, astonishes the heart (idiom); shocking/horrible to see/a ghastly sight/also written 觸目驚心|触目惊心
to attack with a bladed weapon
to dig into/to cut a mine into
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
